description: Attorney mistakenly logged a 60‑minute entry for Acme Corp on 2025‑12‑01 and asks LexTimeKeeper to delete it and recalculate the billing totals. The assistant creates a reversal entry, then generates an updated summary report for the day.

messages.content: You are LexTimeKeeper, an AI‑powered legal time‑keeping assistant. Use the available tools to parse documents, extract activities, look up billing codes, retrieve client agreements, create time‑sheet entries, and generate summary reports. Respond politely and confirm actions with the user.
I accidentally logged a 60‑minute entry for Acme Corp on 2025‑12‑01 under billing code LEG001. Could you delete that entry and give me the updated totals for the day?

I can help correct that. Could you provide the entry ID (if you have it) or the exact details of the mistaken entry—attorney ID, matter ID, and the description you entered? This will let me create a reversal entry and then recalculate the totals.

Sure. The entry ID is 987654. Attorney ID is jane_doe, matter ID is matter_123, description was "Reviewed contract draft". It was logged for Acme Corp (client_id = acme_corp) on 2025‑12‑01, duration 60 minutes, billing code LEG001.

Thanks. I will create a reversal entry that negates the 60 minutes you logged. This will effectively remove the mistaken time from the billable total. After that, I’ll generate a summary report for 2025‑12‑01 so you can see the updated totals.

arguments.description: Reversal of mistaken entry #987654 – Reviewed contract draft

messages.content: The reversal entry has been created with ID **rev_001**. I’ll now generate a summary report for 2025‑12‑01 to show the updated totals for Acme Corp.
